nodes.text: Chris Cassidy is the author of four short stories, three co-authored with Tish Pahl—A Credit for Your Thoughts, Hutt and Seek, and Simple Tricks—and one solo tale, Precipice. She was slated to write Credit Denied[source?] for Star Wars Adventure Journal 16, but it was canceled.
She tuckerized fan Tracy Duncan as Dunc T'racen in Hutt and Seek, and helped make a custom action figure of Kettch for Aaron Allston.
Short stories co-written with Tish Pahl
